And Coopers full bar has the largest selection of draft ales, lagers and ciders in the area.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

Our 42 luxurious and spacious guestrooms and suites each reflect a unique style and character.

Our identity is synonymous with world class live music, elevated bar food, a full range of libations, sporting spirit and an overriding comfort factor that makes us a home away from home.

Diego’s makes every attempt to purchase organic ingredients from local farmers to bring you the healthiest and freshest restaurant experience possible.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: This mountain lodge across from Donner Lake sits on over an acre of forest along year round Gregory Creek and offers something for everyone. Each themed guest room in our inn has a gas fireplace, private bath and forest views. Families will appreciate our comfortably furnished great room with fireplace, books, and games.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Emma Nevada House
mission_description: This elegantly restored and decorated 1856 Victorian is named for 19th Century opera star Emma Nevada. Quiet location, gourmet breakfast. Six rooms, private bath, fireplaces, jacuzzi tubs.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: FiftyFifty Brewing Co. is a locally owned and operated craft brewpub, home to internationally award winning brews, as well as sustainable and organic food. Come enjoy our full bar, beautiful patio, and warm friendly atmosphere. Lunch, dinner, and of course beer, served daily. And check our website for live music and special events.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Passionately served, compassionately crafted made to order hand roasted coffee with a strong emphasis on home brewing education and cultural development.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Friar Tuck’s on the corner of Pine and Commercial Street in Nevada City’s Historic District has been a festive dining and lounge experience since 1973. Friar Tuck’s features a warm, unique atmosphere with friendly staff, an extensive steak, seafood and fondue menu, award winning wine list, classic cocktails and live music nightly.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Gold Creek Inn B&B
mission_description: This newly renovated 1860 Victorian Bed & Breakfast stands aside the confluence of Deer Creek & Gold Run Creek a block away from Downtown Nevada City. The Inn has 5 unique rooms of which most have their own private bathrooms, & balconies that overlook the Nevada City Historic Flume that spans the canyon with views the year round babbling creek & waterfall. Enjoy a glass of wine, coffee or tea along the creekside patio under the forest canopy.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Golden Era Lounge
mission_description: Born out of our love for the rich history of Nevada City, Golden Era was envisioned to become a premiere location for handcrafted cocktails, premium local wines, and craft beers. The Golden Era location has been serving cocktails, spirits & beers since 1867 in the heart of the gold country. Our historic bar was made in the mid 1890s in Chicago, and has been in place here since 1904.  Our handcrafted cocktails are made from house made syrups & bitters reminiscent of the Golden Era of turn of the century & Prohibition style cocktails. We also have a handcrafted soda fountain offering of non alcoholic beverages.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Golden Gate Saloon
mission_description: The Golden Gate Saloon is known as the old­est con­tin­u­ously oper­at­ing saloon west of the Mis­sis­sippi. Stephen and Clara Smith were among the first to invest in this boomtown known today as Grass Valley. They built the Golden Gate Saloon which sadly, was destroyed by a fire in 1855 along with most of Grass Valley. The Smiths rebuilt the popular saloon as a one story fieldstone building with a brick façade, making it safer from the threat of another fire.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Grass Valley Brewing Company
mission_description: Grass Valley Brewing Company is a small, locally owned brewery in Grass Valley, CA.  We are a 15 barrel brewery that produces a variety of classic and innovative beers. When you visit you will typically find 12 classic and innovative beers on tap. If you’re hungry, we’ve got you covered with a full service kitchen. Our draft and canned beers are available throughout the region.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Harmony Ridge Lodge
mission_description: A mixture of rustic luxury in a stunning natural setting makes Harmony Ridge Lodge the perfect getaway. Our spacious guest suites are exquisitely designed, with many amenities to make you feel at ease. All guest suites have mini refrigerators, microwaves and coffee pots. In the morning we offer continental breakfast in our dining room or outside on the deck. Our tended gardens and 3.5 acres of private woods are a great way to take in the beauty of nature.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Haven Underground
mission_description: Haven is located at 226 Broad Street in the heart of historical downtown Nevada City featuring a beer, wine & herbal elixir bar, friendly staff and fun atmosphere. The Haven offers a Funktion 1 sound system, huge dance floor and a schedule of top notch artists. The Haven is also available to rent for private parties, events, classes, workshops and performances.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Our cuisine is that of Louisiana. New Orleans to be specific. We chose New Orleans because the food is warm, tasty, and delicious. We also chose New Orleans because it is a melting pot, with a Cajun foundation, and diverse ethnic contributions. The food is delicious from the first bite to the last.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Inn Town Campground
mission_description: Located just minutes from downtown Nevada City, California! Dan and Erin Thiem, owners of the Outside Inn, are excited to bring Nevada City a new, vibrant camping experience. The campground is located on a historic 15 acre site, just under two miles from downtown Nevada City.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Jernigan’s Tap House & Grill
mission_description: Jernigan’s features fresh, draft beers, delicious handmade food and sports on our big screens.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

We serve a wide selection of dishes (pizza, pasta, sandwiches, burgers, steaks, chops, roasts, fish, chicken, and seafood).

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Lamb’s Victorian Inn
mission_description: Lamb’s Victorian Inn is an elegant and cozy bed and breakfast, located walking distance from a charming historic downtown, where you can enjoy many restaurants, boutique shops, antiques, art galleries, book stores, and wine tasting rooms.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Lefty’s Grill
mission_description: The Restaurant is owned and operated by left handed Chefs, Chris Duncan and John Cammack. Established in 2008, Lefty’s Grill is Located in Historic Downtown Nevada City, CA with the goal of serving fantastic local food, great prices and a casual dining experience. Our Historic building, built in 1872, has been around since the Gold Rush.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Lucchesi Vineyards Tasting Room
mission_description: The Lucchesi Tasting Room is open from 11:00 am until the party's over, every day except Easter, Christmas, and Thanksgiving. Our summer hours are extended for special events, please call us for more information.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Lucchesi Vineyards Winery
mission_description: High upon a hillside overlooking Nevada County with beautiful views of the Sierra Nevada mountains is our vineyard and winery. Come visit Nevada County, take in the views and discover our world class, limited production wines.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Marg’s Taco Bistro
mission_description: At Margs Taco Bistro, Chef Bryan Brutsch reinterprets Latin cuisine, blending traditional Latino flavors with global ingredients and cooking techniques. The menu is inspired by ingredients and cooking techniques from as close to home as our backyard gardens and as far away as Asia. And what pairs better with an authentic Mexican dish than unforgettable margaritas, ice cold Mexican beers, and dozens of rare tequilas?

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: McGee’s Annex
mission_description: After 34 years in business, the recently remodeled McGee's Annex is still going strong with the addition of fresh cooked pizza and local beer to our menu.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: MeZe Eatery
mission_description: Mezé is a Middle Eastern Eatery offering conscious, healthy and simple food, a casual and warm atmosphere, ordering convenience, excellent customer service and attention to detail

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Moody’s Bistro Bar & Beats is the place in Truckee for great food and atmosphere. Set in the warmhearted ambiance of the historic Truckee Hotel, Moody’s complements its fine dining with critically praised, nationally touring Jazz, Americana, Soul and Rhythm and Blues bands with a splash of Hip Hop.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Naggiar Vineyards
mission_description: A surprising gem in the budding Sierra Foothills wine industry, Naggiar is much more than just an off the beaten path treasure. Our winery is also the source of some of California’s most desirable grapes, a vast array of varietals grown at the ideal 1,300 foot elevation. We save our most prized grapes, however, for the enjoyment of our family and guests. All of our wines are estate grown, produced and bottled; ripe with nuance, distinctly evocative, and always exceeding expectations.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Here at the Classic we proudly mix our US and French family heritage, our world traveling and ten years of dining experience to create a classic menu focused on old style, Nevada city meals, mixed with a blend of French country family cuisine. We make sure to select organic and natural foods whenever possible to ensure you receive only the best when it comes to your meal. Featured in the Hallmark movie, The Christmas Card.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Nevada City Winery represents the rustic history and elegance of Northern California. As the oldest operating winery in the region, the founder is attributed to revitalizing the wine industry in this foothill appellation. Proud of its origin and connected to its roots, Nevada City Winery has purchased grapes from local growers to produce award winning wines dating back to 1980.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Incredible food prepared with the freshest most natural ingredients from scratch. All of which may be enjoyed with a vast array of wines and beers.

We purchased the 5 Mile House to create an extension of the atmosphere cultivated at the Nevada City Taproom. Make it your local watering hole, your second dining room, your favorite place to meet family and friends, the place you come to at the end of a hard day for a great beer and tasty food.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

We feature an extensive menu with nightly specials inspired by the delicious cuisine of Northern Italy. We also feature an impressive rotating wine list with numerous options from California and Italy, and a full bar featuring classic cocktails and aperitifs. We are defined by our welcoming friendly staff, remarkable consistent food, and warm eclectic old world ambiance.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Comfortable, casual, and private, our cozy cottages are a relaxed setting for singles, couples and families. As our guest, you will retire to a one, two or three room cottage with French/English Country or Early American decor.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Pilot Peak Winery
mission_description: Pilot Peak Winery is located in Northern California’s Sierra Foothills, an hour north of Sacramento and just a few miles outside Grass Valley and Nevada City in the town of Penn Valley. Comparative Tasting is a private and relaxed tasting method that allows you to savor, compare and contrast each wine.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: A luxurious Victorian home with modern convenience and incredible comfort in downtown Nevada City. Truly a home for all seasons! Splendid in snow, spring, summer, or the height of fall color. Live theater, fine dining, wine tasting, art galleries, boutique shops, all within walking distance. The film venues for Nevada City and the Wild & Scenic Film Festivals are all a short walk away.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Enjoy a local culinary adventure by tasting your way through the Purveyors Pantry retail tasting room, a true brand experience. Over 100 different locally made sauces, condiments and spreads available to taste. Purveyors Pantry also produces jams, spreads and sauces for a number of northern CA farms and artisans, all available to sample. Purveyors Pantry Kitchen focuses on all natural and organic ingredients, responsibly sourced. Dine on freshly baked muffins, cookies and breads, have a great bowl of house made soup or lite fare menu on the weekends

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Sergio’s appreciation for food from around the world started with his parents, who moved from Italy to Argentina after World War II. He and Lena, who is originally from Ukraine, married in 2002 and opened Sergio's Caffé soon after. Their vision of opening a modest restaurant with affordable, good food has far exceeded their initial goal to the delight of their well pleased customers.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Sierra Bakehouse is owned by pastry chefs Kristy and Daniella. Sierra Bakehouse combines their East and West Coast talents, bringing Truckee and Tahoe top notch high elevation baked goods. It is their mission to bring joy and flavor using high quality, local, organic ingredients.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Small Lot Wine, Friendly Wine Tasting. Our goal is to have our visitors Come for the Wine and Savor the Experience. Toward that end, Friday evenings, year round, mean live bands and amazing Oak-fired Brick Oven Pizza and other delicious fare.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

Conveniently located 3 blocks from theatres, restaurants and shops in Historic Downtown Grass Valley, a 15 minute drive to scenic rivers and lakes, and a 60 minute drive to the ski resorts.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: The Starr family has been producing award winning wines in the Sierra Foothills since 1996. We take pride in crafting small lot wines from our estate vineyards, specializing in Zinfandel, Sauvignon Blanc and Cabernet Franc (along with many others).   We strive for our wines to express our unique terroir and showcase varietal character at its finest.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Sopa Thai Cuisine
mission_description: Located in the heart of Yuba City and Nevada City, Sopa Thai Cuisine saw its first day in 2004. A typical Thai restaurant, Sopa Thai Cuisine has a casual ambiance and an atmosphere that transports you directly to the top of the Grand Palace in Bangkok. Our homemade cuisine is a perfectly inexpensive recipe, a little bit of tradition, an ounce of modern cooking inspired by different regions, and a big cup of love from our Chef Owner Sopa and her team.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: South Pine Cafe
mission_description: Thank you for visiting us at South Pine Cafe. We serve breakfast, lunch and beer at both of our locations. We are located both in Grass Valley and Nevada City, California. We are dedicated to serving freshly prepared and healthy dining options. Whenever possible, we support our local farmers and vendors. Our menu items are made in house, to order, with fresh and natural ingredients.

mission_description: Stella is an interactive culinary dining affair.  Stella highlights a focused menu shaped by creative imagination that combines familiarity with innovation. All of our meals are accompanied by direct access to our chefs throughout the evening to ensure you remain connected to what’s behind each menu.  It is our goal to give our community an intimate dining experience showcasing new approaches to traditional and exotic flavors in conjunction with what defines Truckee and North Lake Tahoe…..its people.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: Espresso Bar, Natural foods, Organic & Fair Trade. Locovore, Gluten Free, Made to order breakfasts. Live Music on Saturday and Sundays from 10 am to 1 pm.

mission_description: The Cedar House Sport Hotel is an active lifestyle hotel with 42 rooms and suites in a hip European style, complete with an avant garde restaurant and in-house adventure guiding company.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Holbrooke Hotel
mission_description: The Holbrooke Hotel, located in the heart of gold country, has a storied past and welcomed guests including presidents Ulysses S. Grant, Grover Cleveland, Benjamin Harrison, and James Garfield, authors Mark Twain and Jack London, and the infamous Black Bart.

mission_description: Here at the Classic we proudly mix our US and French family heritage, our world traveling and ten years of dining experience to create a classic menu focused on old style, Nevada city meals, mixed with a blend of French country family cuisine. As we have our customers’ best interests in mind, especially when it comes to their food, we make sure to select organic and natural foods whenever possible to ensure you receive only the best when it comes to your meal.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Outside Inn
mission_description: Providing lodging in Nevada City, California, the Outside Inn is a small hotel that sits in a quiet residential neighborhood just two blocks from downtown. The family owned motel features unique themed rooms under tall pines and is just a short walk to bookstores, coffee, shopping, entertainment and restaurants.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Pour House
mission_description: The Pour House is the Truckee local's secret spot and a delicious escape from the hustle of the main drag. Cozy up to our bar and sample small production wines from around the world, at great local's rate pricing. We have the best cheese selection in Truckee as well, with all the crackers, salami, olives, jams and jellies you could want for the perfect picnic at the bar, apres ski or blizzard rations. And did someone say chocolate? We've got you covered there, too.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Pour House
mission_description: With 15 taps of fresh cold craft brew and a never ending list of local and top quality wines we have the perfect refreshment choice for everyone!

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Richardson House Inn
mission_description: This beautifully restored historic Victorian home known as 'The Richardson House was originally built when Truckee was a Wild West railroad town. For decades the house was operated as a bed & breakfast and recently converted to a vacation rental. The home remains the centerpiece of Truckee as it overlooks downtown and the Truckee River. The Richardson House is within walking distance of the town's best restaurants and liveliest bars.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Stone House
mission_description: Our mission is to provide great food, inspiring libations and a conducive atmosphere for our guests to celebrate life in this historic Sierra foothills Restaurant, Tavern, Event Venue.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay

mission_description: We look forward to providing you the best service and the greatest possible products we can.  We offer 30 taps of constantly rotating craft beers, great local wines, and great food to compliment both.  Plus we love dogs, bring your fury friend along to our dog friendly patio.  As we grow, it is our hopes that we become embedded as a staple in Grass Valley and Nevada County because we love our community.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Truckee Hotel
mission_description: Located in the heart of historic downtown Truckee, when you walk into the lobby you will find a caring and gracious staff that will go out of their way to make you feel welcome and at home. The Truckee Hotel is centrally located to many North Lake Tahoe ski areas such as Squaw Valley, site of the 1960's Winter Olympics, as well as Northstar, Sugar Bowl, Alpine Meadows, Tahoe Donner, Royal Gorge and more.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: The Willo Steakhouse
mission_description: Established 1969, full bar. A Nevada County institution. Voted best steak year after year by the readers of The Union. Also named favorite roadhouse by Sacramento Magazine. Over 1 million hand cut, choice, aged New York steaks cooked on our grill.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Three Forks Bakery & Brewing Co.
mission_description: Three Forks Bakery & Brewing Co serves wood-fired pizza, craft beer brewed in our 7 barrel brewhouse, regional wines, hard cider, artisan breads, baked goods, soup, salad, sandwiches, fresh drinks, loose leaf tea, espresso and coffee. We source as much of our food as possible from local organic producers.

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Tofanelli’s Gold Country Bistro
mission_description: Tofanelli's Gold Country Bistro, Nevada County's popular destination for breakfast, lunch, dinner... or simply enjoying a bottle of fine wine, delicious appetizers and fresh air in the charming outdoor patio. Enjoy our full bar too!

layer: Artisan Places to Eat Drink and Stay
name: Truckee Donner Lodge
mission_description: Slow down, breathe and unwind at the Truckee Donner Lodge. Nestled in the heart of the Sierra Nevada mountains only minutes from Lake Tahoe and Donner Lake, the Truckee Donner Lodge is uniquely designed with your relaxation in mind. Rooms that are well appointed with rates that are unexpected.
